skills.name: Slash Rocks
skills.description: Swings a giant sword to deal damage and decrease the target's Defense for 2 turns with a 40% chance. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%

Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark> + 0.18*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Slash Waves
skills.description: Attacks an enemy with a sword 2 times. Each attack has a 50% chance to decrease the target's Attack Power for 2 turns. This attack will deal more damage according to your MAX HP.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark> + 0.12*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Knighthood (Passive)
skills.description: Decreases the damage that all other allies receive by 20%. This effect won't add up to other damage reduction effects. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Reduce incoming DMG
skill_effect.description: Reduce incoming DMG by a certain amount.
